card.name: Raging Ravine
card.property: Raging Ravine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. {2}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Raging Ravine becomes a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." It's still a land.

card.name: Quest for Renewal
card.property: Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, you may put a quest counter on Quest for Renewal. As long as there are four or more quest counters on Quest for Renewal, untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

card.name: Talus Paladin
card.property: Whenever Talus Paladin or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Allies you control gain lifelink until end of turn, and you may put a +1/+1 counter on Talus Paladin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why fill pockets with gold when you can fill hearts with conviction?"

card.name: Quag Vampires
card.property: Multikicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Quag Vampires enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Rumbling Aftershocks
card.property: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, you may have Rumbling Aftershocks deal damage to target creature or player equal to the number of times that spell was kicked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I like it here. You always get a little more for your mana."—Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Tideforce Elemental
card.property: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap another target creature. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Tideforce Elemental.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ebb and flow, high tide and low, quick as sand and just as slow.

card.name: Skitter of Lizards
card.property: Multikicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Haste Skitter of Lizards enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Grotag Thrasher
card.property: Whenever Grotag Thrasher attacks, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblin fancied himself a rider. The lizard was happy with its new flail.

card.name: Kalastria Highborn
card.property: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each of Malakir's great families boasts a contingent of nulls appropriate to its rank in society.

card.name: Novablast Wurm
card.property: Whenever Novablast Wurm attacks, destroy all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sun was born within its coils, but it fled to the sky. The wurm hungers for its child, and the world will bear its loss."—Screed of the Mul Daya

card.name: Nature's Claim
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On this plane, the use of magic can provoke a ferocious reprisal from nature. Whoever the Eldrazi were, their relics left Zendikar forever enraged."—Jace Beleren

card.name: Agadeem Occultist
card.property: {T}: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Surrakar Banisher
card.property: When Surrakar Banisher enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Surrakar grab things they don't want.

card.name: Kitesail
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.

card.name: Butcher of Malakir
card.property: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

card.name: Smother
card.property: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before I hire new recruits, I test how long they can hold their breath. You'd be surprised how often it comes up."—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

card.name: Wind Zendikon
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Chain Reaction
card.property: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

card.name: Join the Ranks
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Soldier Ally creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Expeditionary houses are notorious for their rivalries. But when adventurers meet in the wilderness, the instinct for mutual survival outweighs petty grudges.

card.name: Smoldering Spires
card.property: Smoldering Spires enters the battlefield tapped. When Smoldering Spires enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Jagwasp Swarm
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know how to tell a sapling explorer from an old hardhead? See which one mistakes a swarm of jagwasps for the setting sun."—Chadir the Navigator

card.name: Urge to Feed
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

card.name: Crusher Zendikon
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 4/2 red Beast creature with trample. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Horizon Drake
card.property: Flying, protection from lands

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Using thermal updrafts and gravity currents, drakes eat and sleep in the air. Some never touch the ground from birth until death.

card.name: Dead Reckoning
card.property: You may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. If you do, Dead Reckoning deals damage equal to that card's power to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many venture out to hunt for treasures. Others lie in wait to hunt the hunters.

card.name: Scrib Nibblers
card.property: {T}: Exile the top card of target player's library. If it's a land card, you gain 1 life. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Scrib Nibblers.

card.name: Explore
card.property: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

card.name: Dread Statuary
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}: Dread Statuary becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last reliable landmark in Tazeem just walked away.

card.name: Vapor Snare
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vapor Snare unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Quest for the Nihil Stone
card.property: Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Nihil Stone. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand and Quest for the Nihil Stone has two or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 5 life.

card.name: Slavering Nulls
card.property: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having lost their minds, they now want yours.

card.name: Mire's Toll
card.property: Target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the bridge snapped, Berko was sure he heard the swamp laughing at him.

card.name: Apex Hawks
card.property: Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Flying Apex Hawks enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Vastwood Animist
card.property: {T}: Target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature until end of turn, where X is the number of Allies you control. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He calls on the forests for counsel and summons the earth to his cause.

card.name: Avenger of Zendikar
card.property: When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

card.name: Kitesail Apprentice
card.property: As long as Kitesail Apprentice is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Carving lines through the sky, kite sailors map trails for the pilgrims below to follow.

card.name: Refraction Trap
card.property: If an opponent cast a red instant or sorcery spell this turn, you may pay {W} rather than pay Refraction Trap's mana cost. Prevent the next 3 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Refraction Trap deals that much damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Lodestone Golem
card.property: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Somehow it warps the Æther. It brings a strange weight, a blockade in the flow of spellcraft."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Stirring Wildwood
card.property: Stirring Wildwood enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. {1}{G}{W}: Until end of turn, Stirring Wildwood becomes a 3/4 green and white Elemental creature with reach. It's still a land.

card.name: Bojuka Brigand
card.property: Bojuka Brigand can't block. Whenever Bojuka Brigand or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bojuka Brigand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't do tactics. I don't do guard duty. I do damage. Take it or leave it."

card.name: Veteran's Reflexes
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Assume everything wants to kill you. At the very least, assume everything wants what's in your pack."

card.name: Death's Shadow
card.property: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

card.name: Quest for the Goblin Lord
card.property: Whenever a Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Goblin Lord. As long as Quest for the Goblin Lord has five or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Omnath, Locus of Mana
card.property: Green mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end. Omnath, Locus of Mana gets +1/+1 for each green mana in your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It gathers against the coming storm.

card.name: Slingbow Trap
card.property: If a black creature with flying is attacking, you may pay {G} rather than pay Slingbow Trap's mana cost. Destroy target attacking creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tajuru elves devised ways to let the forest defend itself.

card.name: Caustic Crawler
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Novice explorers can mistake the acid-carved stone lairs for ancient ruins. They rarely survive to learn better.

card.name: Celestial Colonnade
card.property: Celestial Colonnade enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. {3}{W}{U}: Until end of turn, Celestial Colonnade becomes a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying and vigilance. It's still a land.

card.name: Dispel
card.property: Counter target instant spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Jwari winds undo reality as easily as they scatter a pile of leaves.

card.name: Razor Boomerang
card.property: Equipped creature has "{T}, Unattach Razor Boomerang: Razor Boomerang deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Return Razor Boomerang to its owner's hand." Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few can catch it without losing a finger.

card.name: Tomb Hex
card.property: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Bloodhusk Ritualist
card.property: Multikicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} any number of times as you cast this spell.) When Bloodhusk Ritualist enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Terra Eternal
card.property: All lands have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If this world could make a wish, it would be to survive the parasites who loot its treasures and threaten its life force."—Saidah, Joraga hunter

card.name: Akoum Battlesinger
card.property: Haste Whenever Akoum Battlesinger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Enclave Elite
card.property: Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Enclave Elite enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Calcite Snapper
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may switch Calcite Snapper's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Strength of the Tajuru
card.property: Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Choose target creature, then choose another target creature for each time Strength of the Tajuru was kicked. Put X +1/+1 counters on each of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavy enough to withstand the Roil, leatherback skeletons are havens for travelers in storms and landshifts.

card.name: Kor Firewalker
card.property: Protection from red Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

card.name: Hada Freeblade
card.property: Whenever Hada Freeblade or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hada Freeblade.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I toiled in Kazuul's mines when I was eight. I think I'm tough enough for a little hiking."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Astride the bucking creature, Gribble hurtled down the mountainside while his Grotag brethren cheered. It was at that moment that legend of the Skrill Tamer was born.

card.name: Snapping Creeper
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Creeper gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its vast network of roots and vines keeps it aware of distant dangers.

card.name: Stoneforge Mystic
card.property: When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Cosi's Ravager
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cosi has many followers. Even the volcano finds a way to do his bidding."—Zakken, Enclave cleric

card.name: Comet Storm
card.property: Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Choose target creature or player, then choose another target creature or player for each time Comet Storm was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

card.name: Guardian Zendikon
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 2/6 white Wall creature with defender. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Archon of Redemption
card.property: Flying Whenever Archon of Redemption or another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Until Emeria is freed, he raises his sword in her name.

card.name: Bestial Menace
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My battle cry reaches ears far keener than yours."—Saidah, Joraga hunter

card.name: Halimar Excavator
card.property: Whenever Halimar Excavator or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Nemesis Trap
card.property: If a white creature is attacking, you may pay {B}{B} rather than pay Nemesis Trap's mana cost. Exile target attacking creature. Create a token that's a copy of that creature. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Pilgrim's Eye
card.property: Flying When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

card.name: Abyssal Persecutor
card.property: Flying, trample You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His slaves crave death more than they desire freedom. He denies them both.

card.name: Bazaar Trader
card.property: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No need for a hurda? How about these maps to recently discovered tombs? Or these vials of invisible potion? Very fancy . . ."

card.name: Lavaclaw Reaches
card.property: Lavaclaw Reaches enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. {1}{B}{R}: Until end of turn, Lavaclaw Reaches becomes a 2/2 black and red Elemental creature with "{X}: This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn." It's still a land.

card.name: Marshal's Anthem
card.property: Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control get +1/+1. When Marshal's Anthem enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times Marshal's Anthem was kicked.

card.name: Loam Lion
card.property: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Zendikar, today's grassland could be tomorrow's jungle, and hunting grounds change as quickly as the weather.

card.name: Hammer of Ruin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By hammer forged, and by hammer undone.

card.name: Treasure Hunt
card.property: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The longer the journey, the more one learns."—Isanke, Halimar seastalker

card.name: Quicksand
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all deaths are etched with mythic meaning and iconic glory.

card.name: Harabaz Druid
card.property: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Allies you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I care nothing for treasure. The land beckons me, and I cannot rest until my feet have touched every inch of it."

card.name: Dragonmaster Outcast
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cast out by my tribe, I am a pariah trapped in this mammal's carcass. Only my true kin hear my cries."

card.name: Iona's Judgment
card.property: Exile target creature or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath the gaze of angels, only the righteous may stand without fear.

card.name: Mysteries of the Deep
card.property: Draw two cards. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Roil is destructive, but not random. It's Zendikar's way of revealing secrets."—Ilori, merfolk falconer

card.name: Searing Blaze
card.property: Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature that player controls. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player and 3 damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Wrexial, the Risen Deep
card.property: Islandwalk, swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island or a Swamp.) Whenever Wrexial, the Risen Deep deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Terastodon
card.property: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

card.name: Thada Adel, Acquisitor
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Thada Adel, Acquisitor deals combat damage to a player, search that player's library for an artifact card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Hedron Rover
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hedron Rover gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now that it has woken up and wandered off, we should go see what it was guarding."—Gotzen, Bulwark explorer

card.name: Stone Idol Trap
card.property: Stone Idol Trap costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature. Create a 6/12 colorless Construct artifact creature token with trample. Exile it at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Ruin Ghost
card.property: {W}, {T}: Exile target land you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Forsaken Ones haunt the ruins that flicker in and out of the spirit realm. Such sites are hard to find and even harder to loot.

card.name: Bull Rush
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's gone mad! Loose the chains and save what you can!"

card.name: Claws of Valakut
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."

card.name: Summit Apes
card.property: As long as you control a Mountain, Summit Apes has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you climb Skyfang Peak, avoid the pass. Generations of apes made that trail, and they don't tolerate trespassers."—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

card.name: Khalni Garden
card.property: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Wolfbriar Elemental
card.property: Multikicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} any number of times as you cast this spell.) When Wolfbriar Elemental enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Aether Tradewinds
card.property: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wind smells of misfortune. Check your knots."—Anitan, Ondu cleric

card.name: Groundswell
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Vastwood Zendikon
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 6/4 green Elemental creature. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Joraga Warcaller
card.property: Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Joraga Warcaller enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked. Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on Joraga Warcaller.

card.name: Twitch
card.property: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The flow is diverted. Your path is clear. What are you waiting for—the cave to bid you welcome?"—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Sejiri Steppe
card.property: Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Halimar Depths
card.property: Halimar Depths enters the battlefield tapped. When Halimar Depths enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Bojuka Bog
card.property: Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped. When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target player's graveyard. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Lightkeeper of Emeria
card.property: Multikicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Flying When Lightkeeper of Emeria enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Battle Hurda
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Murasan hurdas were too aggressive to tolerate a harness, so we put them on guard duty. Now the bandits can't get within spitting distance of us." —Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

card.name: Shoreline Salvager
card.property: Whenever Shoreline Salvager deals combat damage to a player, if you control an Island, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They search for treasures that wash up from the depths. Tracking one could lead you to riches. Or in circles."—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Mordant Dragon
card.property: Flying {1}{R}: Mordant Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Mordant Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal that much damage to target creature that player controls.

card.name: Cunning Sparkmage
card.property: Haste {T}: Cunning Sparkmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see the weaknesses you hide even from yourself."

card.name: Voyager Drake
card.property: Multikicker {U} (You may pay an additional {U} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Flying When Voyager Drake enters the battlefield, up to X target creatures gain flying until end of turn, where X is the number of times Voyager Drake was kicked.

card.name: Amulet of Vigor
card.property: Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield tapped and under your control, untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After years of study, I've learned an important lesson: the relics we watch may be watching us back."—Anowon, the Ruin Sage

card.name: Tectonic Edge
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Tectonic Edge: Destroy target nonbasic land. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls four or more lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We move because the earth does."—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

card.name: Kazuul, Tyrant of the Cliffs
card.property: Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, if you're the defending player, create a 3/3 red Ogre creature token unless that creature's controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Warning to those who scale the cliffs without paying tribute: It's a long way down.

card.name: Admonition Angel
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target nonland permanent other than Admonition Angel. When Admonition Angel leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: Sejiri Merfolk
card.property: As long as you control a Plains, Sejiri Merfolk has first strike and lifelink. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Rest for the Weary
card.property: Target player gains 4 life. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that player gains 8 life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zendikar is a brutal taskmaster, but sometimes it offers unexpected solace.

card.name: Graypelt Hunter
card.property: Trample Whenever Graypelt Hunter or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Graypelt Hunter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He'll cleave wood and bone alike to carve a path for his allies.

card.name: Seer's Sundial
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The shadow travels toward the apex. I predict we will soon see the true measure of darkness."

card.name: Marsh Threader
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me a sturdy rope over the advice of any so-called expert. I can thread the dark wilds better than anyone."

card.name: Pulse Tracker
card.property: Whenever Pulse Tracker attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pulse trackers terrorize adventurers, driving them through the jungle toward certain death at the gates of Malakir.

card.name: Jwari Shapeshifter
card.property: You may have Jwari Shapeshifter enter the battlefield as a copy of any Ally creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best expedition would be an entire team of me."

card.name: Feral Contest
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Another target creature blocks it this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The instinct for survival makes enemies of all.

card.name: Permafrost Trap
card.property: If an opponent had a green creature enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay Permafrost Trap's mana cost. Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Walking Atlas
card.property: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crafted by lullmages and bound to the land, it alters itself to match the tumultuous terrain.

card.name: Roiling Terrain
card.property: Destroy target land, then Roiling Terrain deals damage to that land's controller equal to the number of land cards in that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trembling lands ruptured, leaving an open door for things from below to emerge."—Screed of the Mul Daya

card.name: Basilisk Collar
card.property: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During their endless travels, the mages of the Goma Fada caravan have learned ways to harness both life and death.

card.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
card.property: +2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. 0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order. −1: Return target creature to its owner's hand. −12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

card.name: Fledgling Griffin
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Fledgling Griffin gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're making progress, but its desire to explore still far exceeds its ability."—Amadi, Halimar griffin-master

card.name: Spell Contortion
card.property: Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Draw a card for each time Spell Contortion was kicked.

card.name: Brink of Disaster
card.property: Enchant creature or land When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You always have a choice. That doesn't mean you always have a good choice."—Alubri, Guul Draz gatekeeper

card.name: Corrupted Zendikon
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 3/3 black Ooze creature. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Eye of Ugin
card.property: Colorless Eldrazi spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. {7}, {T}: Search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An eye closes. A race awakens.

card.name: Everflowing Chalice
card.property: Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

card.name: Goliath Sphinx
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He makes his home on the tallest mountain in Sejiri, where the vista is as endless as his patience.

card.name: Creeping Tar Pit
card.property: Creeping Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. {1}{U}{B}: Creeping Tar Pit becomes a 3/2 blue and black Elemental creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Arbor Elf
card.property: {T}: Untap target Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mul Daya elves reject their Tajuru kin, calling them arrogant tree-binders who think the roots serve the canopy.

card.name: Gnarlid Pack
card.property: Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."

card.name: Grappler Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creatures of the air wisely avoid the darkest regions of Guul Draz—which is why grappler spiders inhabit the few places touched by the sun's rays.

card.name: Tuktuk Scrapper
card.property: Whenever Tuktuk Scrapper or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact. If that artifact is put into a graveyard this way, Tuktuk Scrapper deals damage to that artifact's controller equal to the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Perimeter Captain
card.property: Defender Whenever a creature you control with defender blocks, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We stand between the jaws of chaos and the mantle of order."

card.name: Canopy Cover
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach. Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

card.name: Quest for Ula's Temple
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put a quest counter on Quest for Ula's Temple. At the beginning of each end step, if there are three or more quest counters on Quest for Ula's Temple, you may put a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Selective Memory
card.property: Search your library for any number of nonland cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I of all people know that memory is not a safe place to hide valuables."—Jace Beleren

card.name: Ricochet Trap
card.property: If an opponent cast a blue spell this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay Ricochet Trap's mana cost. Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In his last seconds, Remhas regretted using his most powerful spell.

card.name: Deathforge Shaman
card.property: Multikicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} any number of times as you cast this spell.) When Deathforge Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to twice the number of times it was kicked.

card.name: Ruthless Cullblade
card.property: Ruthless Cullblade gets +2/+1 as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wields a blade as bloodthirsty and elegant as herself.
